message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. It's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
